presentation.title: About me
description: I'm a committed teamplayer with a multifaceted asset of skills covering most aspects of application developement. Graduated engineer from IMT Mines Albi, my speciality is front-end development. Yet, I've also worked a lot on back-end development, UI prototyping, Agile project manangement, writing documentations and specification, and more. Ambitious and enthusiastic, I'm passionante about in crafting intuitive, appealing, and inclusive apps for greater user satisfaction.

Determination and curiosity are some of my strengths. I often have fun finding new processes or new technologies to improve my work routine, and share with others. As a Techlead, it's crucial to stay up to date, but I take great care to ensure the growth of my colleagues too, always with patience and kindness. My solid knowledge of clean code practices and project management has always been keys to the success of the projects I've worked on.

roles.title: That's me !
description: By being curious and willing, I've become quite polyvalent.
However, Frontend development will stay precious to me.

items.title: Design
description: I value simple and accessible interfaces. If the view needs to be explained, then something's wrong.

items.title: Engineering
description: I consider coding as a modern form of craftmanship, and a fertile ground for expression.

items.title: Agility
description: Management plays a major role in projects' success. I'm not that expansive, but I say what needs to be.

languages.title: Languages
description: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his own language, that goes to his heart.

items.title: Play & Create games
items.description: Fire Emblem is one of my favorite series.

items.title: Learn
items.description: One day after another. A never ending journey.

items.title: Angular Lead Developer & Scrum Master
items.subtitle: Angular Techlead / Scrum Master
description: Development of a web application for coordinating the administration of the Greater Lyon road network, created by CORALY operators. Connected to the IT services of the various operators, it is used by CORALY operators to communicate and propose incident resolution scenarios.
I managed a team of three developers, carried out code reviews, ensured application quality, wrote technical and functional documentation and implemented technical upgrades.

items.title: Angular Lead Developer
items.subtitle: Angular Techlead
description: Development of a suite of web applications for the supervision of the Nice Côte-d'Azur Metropolis. Connected to the Metropole's road equipment and IT services, it is used by the city's Command Post to resolve events occurring in the Nice metropolitan area.

La plataforma incluye un módulo de hipervisión para recopilar datos sobre el terreno en tiempo real, un módulo de cartografía para visualizar el estado de los equipos de carretera, un módulo de repetición para revisar las secuencias operativas y un módulo de configuración para configurar los modelos de datos.

Dirigí un equipo de tres desarrolladores, limpié la base de código, mejoré el rendimiento de la aplicación, maqueté nuevas pantallas, supervisé la redacción de documentos y propuse desarrollos técnicos.

items.title: Full stack Developer (Angular/PHP) & Scrum Master
items.subtitle: Full Stack Developer / UX Designer / Scrum Master
description: Development & maintenance of a budget management application.
I joined the Transversal Services & Coordination Division, with secure deliveries of strategic and transversal programs across Amadeus.

My team aims to bring Predictability to Management for Operational Efficiency and Simplicity for more than 1700 Actors. With 2 Business Specialist and 2 other web developers, one of our activities is to develop and maintain Management Suite, an application allowing our users to manage their budget and resources.

items.title: Web, Android, Alexa Developer Internship
items.subtitle: Web / Android / AWS Developer
description: Creation of innovative applications for humanitarian purposes.
As a frontend & backend developer, I have worked on several projects that aim to bring open-source solutions to humanitarian organizations deployed in conflict zones.
I have studied the complete project lifecycle, and the basic deployment processes of a server with Linux.

items.title: Fullstack (Angular/PHP) Developer Internship
items.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
description: Prototyping of a Master Data Management System to assist in project management
I initiated the implementation of a Master Data Management system, in order to improve the punctuality of the software department's projects.
I worked on the various facets of a three-tier web application: front-end with Angular, back-end with PHP, database with MySQL.
I was also project manager. I used an Agile development process, punctuated by meetings with collaborators from the Cannes and Toulouse sites.

items.title: Personal Website
items.description: An Angular project with serves as both a showcase and a sandbox.

items.title: PokeGuesser
items.description: A React initiation project inspired from on the well-known game Wordle, but with the flavor of Pokémon.

items.title: BotBack
items.description: A puzzle-game created in 48 hours for Game Dev Party's 19th Game Jam at Lyon.

items.title: Isogenius
items.description: A puzzle-game created in 48 hours for 2022 Scientific Game Jam at Lyon.

items.title: Chompa-gnon
items.description: A  platform-game created in 72 hours for Game Dev Party's 20th Game Jam at Lyon.

items.title: Aïku Project
items.description: An X account that regularly publishes haikus and images generated by an AI.

education.title: Baccalaureate S
description: Degree in Engineering Sciences with Mathematics speciality, obtained with honours.

education.title: Intensive study of Mathematics and Phisics
description: Intensive study of mathematics, physics, English and algorithmics (among others), to prepare for the entrance exams to the Grandes Ecoles.

education.title: Engineering school
description: Generalist study of scientific and managerial themes related to engineering professions.
Specialization in Information Systems Management.
